query.name: tH_act
query.script: WITH RECURSIVE source1(id, hid,classnode,code,name,path,level,metaclassid) AS ( SELECT id, hid ,classnode,code,name,ARRAY[name],1,metaclassid FROM units where hid = ${spec1.ACT_ID} UNION all SELECT p.id, p.hid,p.classnode,p.code,p.name,path || p.name,level+1,p.metaclassid FROM source1 pr, units p WHERE pr.id = p.hid ) select s.id from source1 s where upper(s.classnode) = 'ACTION' and s.metaclassid is not null order by path limit 1;

query.name: spec_t1
query.script: select 'Идентификатор' as table_name,'ID' as table_code,'int' as table_tD,'Да' as table_nec union all select 'Родитель иерархии' as table_name, 'HID' as table_code, 'Ссылка на '||upper(${spec_title_1.table_code}) as table_tD,'Нет' as table_nec from metaclassprops g where g.metaclassid = ${spec_title_1.metaclassid} and g.propnode = 'hid';

query.name: spec_t1
query.script: WITH RECURSIVE source1(id, hid,classnode,code,name,path,level,metaclassid) AS ( SELECT id, hid ,classnode,code,name,ARRAY[name],1,metaclassid FROM units where hid = ${spec_title_1.id} UNION all SELECT p.id, p.hid,p.classnode,p.code,p.name,path || p.name,level+1,p.metaclassid FROM source1 pr, units p WHERE pr.id = p.hid ) select s.name as table_name, s.code as table_code, case when k.data_type = 'ARRAY' then (select json_array_elements(('{'||P_SYSTEM_GET_CLASS_BY_ID(s.metaclassid)||'}')::json#>'{A}') ->>'type')||'[]' when (select json_array_elements(('{'||P_SYSTEM_GET_CLASS_BY_ID(s.metaclassid)||'}')::json#>'{A}') ->>'type') = 'ref' then 'Ссылка на '||(select upper(ccu.table_name) from information_schema.table_constraints tc , information_schema.constraint_column_usage ccu , information_schema.key_column_usage kcu where tc.constraint_catalog = ccu.constraint_catalog and tc.constraint_schema = ccu.constraint_schema and tc.constraint_name = ccu.constraint_name AND tc.constraint_type = 'FOREIGN KEY' and upper(tc.table_name) = upper(${spec_title_1.table_code}) and tc.constraint_catalog = kcu.constraint_catalog AND tc.constraint_schema = kcu.constraint_schema AND tc.constraint_name = kcu.constraint_name and lower(kcu.column_name) = lower(s.code)) else (select json_array_elements(('{'||P_SYSTEM_GET_CLASS_BY_ID(s.metaclassid)||'}')::json#>'{A}') ->>'type') end as table_tD, case (select upper(ltrim(rtrim((('{'||P_SYSTEM_GET_CLASS_BY_ID(s.metaclassid)||'}')::json#>'{A}')::text,']'),'[')::json->>'nulls')) when 'FALSE' then 'Да' when 'TRUE' then 'Нет' else 'Нет' end as table_nec from source1 s, information_schema.columns k, metaclass m where lower(k.table_name) = lower(${spec_title_1.table_code}) and lower(k.column_name) = lower(s.code) and m.id = s.metaclassid and s.metaclassid is not null order by m.position,path;

query.name: tH_act
query.script: WITH RECURSIVE source1(id, hid,classnode,code,name,path,level,metaclassid) AS ( SELECT id, hid ,classnode,code,name,ARRAY[name],1,metaclassid FROM units where hid = ${spec_title_1.id} UNION all SELECT p.id, p.hid,p.classnode,p.code,p.name,path || p.name,level+1,p.metaclassid FROM source1 pr, units p WHERE pr.id = p.hid ) select s.id from source1 s where upper(s.classnode) = 'ACTION' and s.path::varchar not like '%Действия с записями%' and lower(s.name) !='настройка' and s.level BETWEEN 1 and 3 and s.metaclassid is not null order by path limit 1;

query.name: spec_title_1
query.script: WITH RECURSIVE source1(id, hid,classnode,code,name,path,level,metaclassid) AS ( SELECT id, hid ,classnode,code,name,ARRAY[name],1,metaclassid FROM units where hid = ${spec_title.fID} UNION all SELECT p.id, p.hid,p.classnode,p.code,p.name,path || p.name,level+1,p.metaclassid FROM source1 pr, units p WHERE pr.id = p.hid ) select ${spec_title.sFORM}||row_number() over(order by m.position,path)||'. Таблица «'||s.name||'»('||s.code||')' as title_st, s.id, s.hid, s.metaclassid, case s.classnode when 'TABLE' then s.code else '-1' end as table_code from source1 s, metaclass m where upper(s.classnode) = 'TABLE' and m.id = s.metaclassid and s.metaclassid is not null order by m.position,path;

query.name: spec_title
query.script: WITH RECURSIVE source1(id, hid,classnode,code,name,path,level,metaclassid) AS ( SELECT id, hid ,classnode,code,name,ARRAY[name],1,metaclassid FROM units where hid = ${spec1.RAZ_ID} UNION all SELECT p.id, p.hid,p.classnode,p.code,p.name,path || p.name,level+1,p.metaclassid FROM source1 pr, units p WHERE pr.id = p.hid ) select row_number() over(order by path)||'. Раздел «'||s.name||'»' as title_s, s.id as fID, row_number() over(order by path)||'.' as sFORM, case s.classnode when 'TABLE' then s.code else '-1' end as table_code from source1 s where s.hid = ${spec1.RAZ_ID} and upper(s.classnode) = 'FORM' and s.level BETWEEN 1 and 3 and s.metaclassid is not null order by path;

query.name: spec1
query.script: WITH RECURSIVE source1(id, hid,classnode,code,name,path,level,metaclassid) AS ( SELECT id, hid ,classnode,code,name,ARRAY[name],1,metaclassid FROM units where hid is null UNION all SELECT p.id, p.hid,p.classnode,p.code,p.name,path || p.name,level+1,p.metaclassid FROM source1 pr, units p WHERE pr.id = p.hid ) select s.name as title, COALESCE((select x.id from source1 x where UPPER(x.classnode) = 'ACTIONS' AND x.hid = s.id),-1) AS ACT_ID, COALESCE((select x.id from source1 x where UPPER(x.classnode) = 'REPORT' AND x.hid = s.id),-1) AS REP_ID, COALESCE((select x.id from source1 x where UPPER(x.classnode) = 'FORMS' AND x.hid = s.id),-1) AS RAZ_ID from source1 s where s.level = 2 and s.metaclassid is not null order by path;
